name: 使徒行传
description: 记录早期教会的建立和使徒们传福音的历史，见证圣灵的大能

verses.zh: 但圣灵降临在你们身上，你们就必得着能力；并要在耶路撒冷、犹太全地和撒玛利亚，直到地极，作我的见证。
verses.en: But you will receive power when the Holy Spirit comes on you; and you will be my witnesses in Jerusalem, and in all Judea and Samaria, and to the ends of the earth.

verses.zh: 彼得说：你们各人要悔改，奉耶稣基督的名受洗，叫你们的罪得赦，就必领受所赐的圣灵。
verses.en: Peter replied, Repent and be baptized, every one of you, in the name of Jesus Christ for the forgiveness of your sins. And you will receive the gift of the Holy Spirit.

verses.zh: 都恒心遵守使徒的教训，彼此交接、掰饼、祈祷。
verses.en: They devoted themselves to the apostles' teaching and to fellowship, to the breaking of bread and to prayer.

verses.zh: 所以你们当悔改归正，使你们的罪得以涂抹，这样，那安舒的日子就必从主面前来到。
verses.en: Repent, then, and turn to God, so that your sins may be wiped out, that times of refreshing may come from the Lord.

verses.zh: 除他以外，别无拯救，因为在天下人间，没有赐下别的名我们可以靠着得救。
verses.en: Salvation is found in no one else, for there is no other name under heaven given to mankind by which we must be saved.

verses.zh: 彼得和众使徒回答说：顺从神，不顺从人，是应当的。
verses.en: Peter and the other apostles replied: We must obey God rather than human beings!

verses.zh: 腓利就跑到太监那里，听见他念先知以赛亚的书，便问他说：你所念的，你明白吗？
verses.en: Then Philip ran up to the chariot and heard the man reading Isaiah the prophet. Do you understand what you are reading? Philip asked.

verses.zh: 主对亚拿尼亚说：你只管去！他是我所拣选的器皿，要在外邦人和君王并以色列人面前宣扬我的名。
verses.en: But the Lord said to Ananias, Go! This man is my chosen instrument to proclaim my name to the Gentiles and their kings and to the people of Israel.

verses.zh: 众先知也为他作见证说：凡信他的人，必因他的名得蒙赦罪。
verses.en: All the prophets testify about him that everyone who believes in him receives forgiveness of sins through his name.

verses.zh: 找着了，就带他到安提阿去。他们足有一年的工夫和教会一同聚集，教训了许多人。门徒称为基督徒是从安提阿起首。
verses.en: and when he found him, he brought him to Antioch. So for a whole year Barnabas and Saul met with the church and taught great numbers of people. The disciples were called Christians first at Antioch.

verses.zh: 因为主曾这样吩咐我们说：'我已经立你作外邦人的光，叫你施行救恩，直到地极。'
verses.en: For this is what the Lord has commanded us: 'I have made you a light for the Gentiles, that you may bring salvation to the ends of the earth.'

verses.zh: 坚固门徒的心，劝他们恒守所信的道，又说：我们进入神的国，必须经历许多艰难。
verses.en: strengthening the disciples and encouraging them to remain true to the faith. We must go through many hardships to enter the kingdom of God, they said.

verses.zh: 他们说：当信主耶稣，你和你一家都必得救。
verses.en: They replied, Believe in the Lord Jesus, and you will be saved—you and your household.

verses.zh: 这地方的人贤于帖撒罗尼迦的人，甘心领受这道，天天考查圣经，要晓得这道是与不是。
verses.en: Now the Berean Jews were of more noble character than those in Thessalonica, for they received the message with great eagerness and examined the Scriptures every day to see if what Paul said was true.

verses.zh: 夜间，主在异象中对保罗说：不要怕，只管讲，不要闭口。
verses.en: One night the Lord spoke to Paul in a vision: Do not be afraid; keep on speaking, do not be silent.

verses.zh: 我却不以性命为念，也不看为宝贵，只要行完我的路程，成就我从主耶稣所受的职事，证明神恩惠的福音。
verses.en: However, I consider my life worth nothing to me; my only aim is to finish the race and complete the task the Lord Jesus has given me—the task of testifying to the good news of God's grace.

verses.zh: 现在你为什么耽延呢？起来！求告他的名受洗，洗去你的罪。
verses.en: And now what are you waiting for? Get up, be baptized and wash your sins away, calling on his name.

verses.zh: 我因此自己勉励，对神、对人，常存无亏的良心。
verses.en: So I strive always to keep my conscience clear before God and man.

verses.zh: 我差你到他们那里去，要叫他们的眼睛得开，从黑暗中归向光明，从撒但权下归向神；又因信我，得蒙赦罪，和一切成圣的人同得基业。
verses.en: to open their eyes and turn them from darkness to light, and from the power of Satan to God, so that they may receive forgiveness of sins and a place among those who are sanctified by faith in me.

verses.zh: 放胆传讲神国的道，将主耶稣基督的事教导人，并没有人禁止。
verses.en: He proclaimed the kingdom of God and taught about the Lord Jesus Christ—with all boldness and without hindrance!
